long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Samaya is a friendly personal dashboard on Chrome's new tab; featuring Nepali calendar, daily Nepali quotes & Nepali wallpapers.

Key Features
- Daily Nepali quotes
- Daily Nepali wallpapers
- Nepali Calendar
- Notes app
